title: My little comment on CrackWatch regarding how repacks work
body:
I’ve spent 20 mins of my life for this, so I will link it here.

https://old.reddit.com/r/CrackWatch/comments/ndecl6/dieselpunk_wars_v11_multi8_16_gb_the_companion/gyhkgp5/

Please don’t attack the subtopic commenter, the guy really doesn’t how how this stuff work, I just felt that this time I could elaborate a process.

Some of you probably also would be surprised, why one repack of 1 GB installs in 30 seconds, and another one of the same size installs in 10 minutes. My comment on CW answers that too.
